櫾字的基本解释

櫾
yòu
古同“柚”：“（荆山）多橘櫾。”

櫾
yóu
古书上说的昆仑山河隅的长木。

櫾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yòu］
［《廣韻》余救切，去宥，以。］
果木名。即柚。古代指大果柚和部分橙类。

櫾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫾； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页562第23
【說文】【正韻】?以周切，音猶。【說文】崑崙山河隅之長木也。　又【唐韻】【集韻】余疚切【正韻】爰救切，?音宥。卽柚也。【列子·湯問篇】吳楚之國，有大木焉，其名爲?，樹碧而冬生，實丹而味酸。食其皮汁，已厥憤之疾。　【正字通】俗?字。○按《說文》有?無?，非俗也。

櫾字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
櫾字的起名意思

暂无。

櫾
Basic explanation of words
櫾
yòu
Ancient Tong "Pomelo": "(Jingshan) has many oranges."
櫾
yóu
The long wood at the corner of the Kunlun Mountains mentioned in ancient books.
櫾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yòu］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jiuqie, go to You, to. ]
Fruit tree name. That is pomelo. In ancient times, it refers to big fruit pomelo and some oranges.
櫾

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫾; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 562 23
[Speaking text] [Zheng Yun]? Cut with Zhou, still sound. [Said the text] The long wood of the Kunlun Mountains and the corner of the river.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Yu Guiqie [Zheng Yun] Rescue,? Yinyou. Pomelo also. 【Liezi·Tang Questions】In the kingdom of Wu and Chu, there is Da Mu Yan, whose name is? Eating its skin juice has already suffered from indignation.　【Zhengzitong】vulgar? ○According to "Shuowen", there is no?, it is not vulgar.
